name: Big-Sad Fall Assistants (Indici Opponibili, farfalk, Elia)
name_original: Big-Sad Fall Assistants (Indici Opponibili, farfalk, Elia)
description:
Save the workforce from non-productivity!

Use two robots with a trampoline and increase the productivity of corporations.

Bounce workers through windows and send them back to their workstations.

Pass the different levels and dodge the resistance if you don't "really" want to overthrow the system.

Drink motor oil, talk to the robot bartender, become aware of the meaning of life and change the world - or at least change yourself.
